descriptionHtml:
This is my \"FIRST\" ever companion mod! :DDD I really hope you guys enjoy her. She took me a while to make (Cause i\'m just starting out. :D) So again hope you guys like! :D 

-About Angel:

-She is an Essential Follower
-She is also Marriable. So enjoy her. ;)

-Requirements: 

-This mod also \"REQUIRES\" ApachiiSkyHair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/? 

-Recommended:

-Use Tera Armors if you want her to have the Armor she has in the picture - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846/?
-If you get Tera Armors you will need to have a UNP mod such as this -  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709//?

-Location: 

-Angel is in front of Jorrvaskr (Which is located in Whiterun). 
-There maybe be a glitch with her not having cloths on, so i\'m getting right to that. 

-Installation: 

-If you use NMM then download this mod with it.
-If your a manual mod installer then download it then drop the contents of the Zip/Rar file into the Skyrim Data Folder.

-Credit:

-Thanks so much to ApachiiHair for just making some crazy awesome hairstyles!!! :D

So if you guys like my mod please rate and favortie my mod. :D If you guys experience any problems with my mod please feel free to tell me. :D
author: xXSn1p3Mast3rXx
